Akshay Shetty

Experienced network consultant engineer and a software developer. Worked with highly demanding clients in time sensitive projects. Very good at analyzing client expectations and delivering quality solutions. Highly motivated and inquisitive in nature. I believe in the concept of Consistency, hard work and patience. Expert in java, data structures, time management and skilled in java script. Familiar with software design patterns

Work Experience

Storyxag, Potsdam Germany

• Working on website development and deployment using Git, Docker, Nginx, react and Angular.

Cisco Systems India, Bangalore

• Worked as an Acceptance Testing and Design Engineer. Contributed in building the complete Acceptance Test portfolio for Reliance JIO 4G
• Lead several Automation Initiatives, like automating the Network Readiness testing processes for real time operations, effectively reducing testing time by 60%, increasing the total work output by 3 fold while decreasing the team size by 50%.
• Conducted a few training sessions for the new employees on the design and architecture of the Reliance JIO network for a period of 4 months and helped them integrate into the acceptance testing team.
• Provided expert risk analysis and software recommendations on various network components.
• Took initiatives in Coordinating with cross-functional teams in solving time critical components for a period of 18months helping the company renew contracts from Reliance Jio 4g worth $60 million.
• Worked for Cisco video and voice collaboration team, implementing enterprise IP network video conferencing solutions.

Kohinoor Computer Services, Bangalore

• Supervised a 10-member team for optimizing web analytics on client's key websites, resulting in zero rollout/release issues.
• Trained 15 colleagues on developing client deliverables and managing expectations resulting in 40% decline in escalations.
• Helped improve revenue by 24% by pushing towards improved automation test scripts.
• Experience in Functional, Regression Testing on Mobile and Web applications in Agile environment, created a release engineering team, to make sure the releases are productive, on time and regressions taken care by at most efficiency.
• Experience in designing test cases, creating, debugging, enhancing test scripts and test scenario.
Worked with the clients in forming the requirement document and help the developing team implement with accuracy, which increased the customer satisfaction and retention rate.
